actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Secretary of the Treasury should increase the standard mileage rate which is used in computing the tax deduction for use of an automobile for charitable purposes.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Secretary of the Treasury should increase the standard mileage rate which is used in computing the tax deduction for use of an automobile for charitable purposes.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Secretary of the Treasury should increase the standard mileage rate which is used in computing the tax deduction for use of an automobile for charitable purposes.
